titleStmt.title: The Earl of Warwicks letter to the Right Honorable, the Committee of Lords and Commons at Derby-House, containing a narrative of his proceedings in pursuit of the revolted ships, and their declining the engagement: and of the conjunction of the Portsmouth fleet with the Lord Admirals. Ordered by the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Warwick, Robert Rich, Earl of, 1587-1658.
